Hai-Nguyen Nguyen

Work-in-progress roboticist

About me

My name is Hai-Nguyen Nguyen, Hann for short.

I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in Robotics at Seoul National University, Korea. Before that, I was a permanent researcher at Vietnam Academy Of Science And Technology, Vietnam.

My current research interests include dynamics and controls problems related to aerial manipulation. Please see my CV or my research for more details.
